title: Best of The Herd: 05/03/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 05/03/2019
description:
Colin takes a shot at the Raptors and Canada in general for never stepping up in the playoffs.  Most athletes think that more money equals more respect but Colin says Tom Brady figured out that isn't true.  Plus, FS1 NBA Analyst Chris Broussard comes in studio to take shots at Canada and talk about Colin's belief that the 76ers should trade Joel Embiid.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
